markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Dhalavei (The Unsuspected Rot)](/Deities.aspx?ID=189)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Infiltrate righteous organizations and governments, destroy trust, perform human sacrifices

**Anathema** Betray a fellow servant of Dhalavei, harm those under Dhalavei's protection

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Favored Weapon** [Temple Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=61)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=28), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)

- **4th**
[Glibness](/Spells.aspx?ID=135)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)

</column>
name: Dhalavei (The Unsuspected Rot)
